prod_name: Faber-Castell TK-Fine-9760 Mechanical Pencils Wallet of 3 - 0.35, 0.5, 0.7mm, Green
title: Faber Castell TK - Fine Lead Pencil Wallet of 3
review: I purchased this pack out of convenience as I needed a 0.35 for my illustrative work quickly. I had already owned a Faber Castell 0.35 mechanical pencil but it broke from a jam due to the fine lead, I assumed it was a fluke. I really should have learnt from my first experience but I had the exact same issue with the 0.35 from this pack, it took 3 months for it to stop working after consistent feeding issues either not coming out to the whole lead sliding out of the pencil, something I would expect from a off brand mechanical pencil.As for 0.75 and 0.50. They are are fine but honestly don't bring anything any to the table that any other cheaper mechanical pencil or in fact a well sharpened standard graphite pencil would offer. Lead is nice I guess, if a little frail but you can just buy the lead separately and put it into another, better pencil. They also look nice with good grip and handling but other brands offer that luxury for cheaper.Looking at other reviews this is a common problem for anyone who actually attempts to use this pencil. I would not recommend this set.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 February 2016

prod_name: Faber-Castell TK-Fine-9760 Mechanical Pencils Wallet of 3 - 0.35, 0.5, 0.7mm, Green
title: Be Careful. It doesn't come in a sealed pack.
review: The retractable tip doesn't retract smoothly. This is in stark contrast to the same pencil I owned earlier. Also doesn't come in a sealed pack/pouch. I realized it only once I received it. Didn't notice this while placing the order.Order at your own risk.I swear by the brand as far as pencils go.

prod_name: Faber-Castell TK-Fine-9760 Mechanical Pencils Wallet of 3 - 0.35, 0.5, 0.7mm, Green
title: Good pencils but fiddly
review: These pencils look nice and feel comfortable to use. They are precise and not too hard to use. The only problem I found was trying to put lead into the thinnest pencil, it was very difficult and the part that grips the lead ended up snapping so I had to throw it away and go for a more sturdy and expensive pencil for my finer work.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 June 2017

prod_name: Faber-Castell TK-Fine-9760 Mechanical Pencils Wallet of 3 - 0.35, 0.5, 0.7mm, Green
title: Not the best
review: I was disappointed with these. I spent a bit more as I wanted a nice drawing pencil for engineering drawings. I've gone back to my cheap ones. Nothing specific wrong with them out than they feel a bit light and cheap.

prod_name: Faber-Castell TK-Fine-9760 Mechanical Pencils Wallet of 3 - 0.35, 0.5, 0.7mm, Green

Nur bei dem 0,35er wollte keine der Minen direkt in den "Schaft" rutschen und so habe ich erstmal eine bzw. ein Stück davon eingebüßt.Vom Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis bin ich sehr positiv eingestimmt.

title: These are a must for any artist
review: Arteza never fails to give good quality products. Before I bought this product I was trying to find packs of professional drawing pencils that had great quality to them. I never seemed to LOVE the packs I'd buy until I bought this.This tin includes 12 professional grade pencils (6B to 4H). I love that all of these pencils come in a metal tin for safe keeping. My other pencils I would throw into the cup that holds my micron pens and primsacolor pencils and it took forever to find the size I needed for my drawing. This metal tin is super lightweight which makes travel so much easier and handy. There's a divot in the tin for each of the 12 pencils keeping them from breaking or getting damaged. The pencils come already sharpened. You can't beat the price for this type of quality which is why I trust Arteza products. They are all affordable and you get the same quality product that you would if you paid more for the expensive brands.If you're looking for professional sketching pencils look no farther. You will not be disappointed by this product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 May 2018

prod_name: ARTEZA Professional Drawing Sketch Pencils Set of 12, Medium (6B - 4H), Art Supplies for Drawing Art, Sketching, Shading, Artist Pencils for Beginners & Pro Artists
title: Correcto
review: Fue un regalo y le encantó. Cumple su función.

prod_name: ARTEZA Professional Drawing Sketch Pencils Set of 12, Medium (6B - 4H), Art Supplies for Drawing Art, Sketching, Shading, Artist Pencils for Beginners & Pro Artists
title: Kinda disappointed...
review: Would love to give more stars on this... but I can't...Firstly... I had to sharpen most pencils, once I sharpened from 3B to 6B... the tip kept breaking...Secondly... I'm quite disappointed about 4H... It's honestly same as if it was H or 2H... Honestly I don't see much of a difference in the pencils from F, H - 4H.Personally... Unfortunately, I don't think I would buy these again. Would rather try different once.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Jetzt kriegt er sie nicht mehr kaputt! :)
review: Wir haben diese Stifte gekauft, weil unser Sohn andauernd mit kaputten Buntstiften nach Hause kam und diese sich nicht mehr spitzen ließen, weil die Mine innen gebrochen war. Dann habe ich diese Stifte hier entdeckt und bin begeistert. Erstmal ist es eine riesen Farbauswahl und mein Sohn hat sich unglaublich darüber gefreut. Und sie gehen wirklich nicht kaputt! Er lässt sie weiterhin mal runterfallen oder macht was weiß ich was damit, aber sie lassen sich spitzen als wäre nichts gewesen!!! Ich werde, wenn sie irgendwann mal aufgebraucht sind, wieder diese kaufen und zwar nur diese! :)

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Great
review: These are great pencil crayons. They have erasers which is excellent for fixing your mistakes. These are my child’s favourite pencil crayons.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: A lot more solid than others out there
review: I’ve purchased all of the big brands and they all seem to be shattered internally as any sharpening leads to taking the snapped off nib out of the sharpener. Very impressed with these so far. Good value too
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 February 2024

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Lots of colors to choose from
review: I like the wide range of colors to choose from. If you press too hard it wont erase. But so far I haven't found a colored pencil that I didn't have this problem with. So works well.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Matite bellissime. Ve le consiglio!
review: Acquistate per la mia bambina, ad un prezzo molto competitivo. Sono fantastiche, le ricomprerò. Consigliate, ahh Made in Germany, ed in un mondo di cineserie, non è poco...

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Satisfait
review: Comme tous les crayons de couleur effaçables, il ne faut pas trop appuyer  en écrivant ou en dessinant car la gomme n'effacera pas convenablement. Par contre, pour une pression modérée sur le papier, le produit fait son job et s'efface correctement.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Ottimo prodotto
review: Cancellabile alla perfezione, ovviamente il colore rimane meno pigmentato. Mio figlio 1 elementare ne è felice

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Lassen sich bei leichten Skizzen gut radieren
review: Die Staedtler Noris Club Farbstifte kommen in einer einfachen Pappschachtel in einem Bündel aus zwölf Stiften daher. Der Clou an den Buntstiften ist, dass sie sich wie gewöhnliche Bleistifte wegradieren lassen sollen. Dementsprechend ist an jedem Stift ein weißes Radiergummi angebracht.Die Buntstifte haben eine gute Farbvielfalt und lassen sich angenehm auftragen. Ich nutze sie vor allen Dingen zum Skizzieren von Aquarellen oder Projekten mit Alkoholmarkern, da Buntstifte kein Graphit enthalten, was sich störend mit den Farben vermengen kann.Bei leichten Skizzen lassen sich die Stifte auch angenehm radieren. Eine leichte Farbtönung ist dennoch zu sehen, vollständig bekommt man die Pigmente also nicht mehr vom Papier. Dies zeigt sich besonders, wenn man einmal ein wenig fester drückt: je mehr Pigment auf die Seiten kommt, desto mehr schmiert die Farbe und desto weniger wirkt das Radiergummi. Darauf sollten vor allen Dingen Menschen mit einem festeren Zeichenstil achten. Für leichte Skizzen oder sanfte Schattierungen sind die Bundstifte aber auf jeden Fall geeignet.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: 消しゴムで消える
review: 色が少し薄いような気もしますが問題なく使えています。消しゴムで消えます。

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: 趣味で
review: 一般的に売っている色鉛筆よりも載りがよくとても使いやすいです趣味が絵を描くことなんですが、今まではシャーペンだけで書いてきたもので買ってよかったとおもいますただひとつだけ言うならば、色鉛筆用にペンケースを用意すると楽ですぜひ買ってみてください

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: They really do erase!
review: Nice bright colours and they really do erase!I bought these for a strange reason. I teach piano and I am constantly copying off pages of music so I can highlight aspects in colour for students. I find this works much better for students than everything in black. However, I'm never sure that pupils should go into exams with books covered in coloured markings. After one pupil found it hard to play the piece when we switched from the colour page to the plain music, I thought it would be brilliant if you could rub out colours in the way you can pencil. And so I found these. They make good strong markings on the page as long as they are sharp. I can't comment on colouring in, I'm afraid, as I've only used them for writing in colour.I'm being brave now and writing over all sorts of things in colour on the assumption I can rub it out later. So far, so good!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 July 2015

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Sehr gute Farbstifte, mein Sohn liebt sie
review: Zuerst habe ich den 12-er Set gekauft, aber mein Sohn hat seine beliebteste Farben in einen Monat genutzt. Also habe ich diesen set gekauft. Die Farben sind toll, das sie radierbar sind ist ein weiterer plus, weswegen ich sie auch gekauft habe.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Very nice pencils
review: What can I say, they are erasable colored pencils, perfect.  Good pigment
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 April 2021

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: qui as dit que les bon crayon de couleurs coutent cher ?
review: Tres bon crayon de couleurs effaçable a la gomme, bonne tenue des couleurs dans le temps. aussi bien pour amateur que pro.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Prodotto valido
review: Buon prodotto. Cercavo delle matite colorate cancellabili per sottolineare nei libri e queste hanno una mina morbida al punto giusto, se fosse troppo dura sarebbe difficile da cancellare e se fosse troppo morbida sbaverebbe il colore. Le consiglio perché sono veramente valide!

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Satisfait
review: Donner en cadeaux

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Perfectos para pintar luego encima con acuarela.
review: Lo he comprado para dibujar y pintar luego con acuarela y me ha gustado el resultado.Para que se borre bien no hay que marcar mucho.No he probado los prismacolor colerase, pero son mas caros y estos merecen la pena.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24

review: sehr schöne Farbpalette, Stifte liegen gut in der Hand. Nachteil: Farbintensität ist etwas "schwach", aber bei dem Preis sollte man darüber hinweg sehen.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: There are better
review: This product didn’t erase very well but it did erase somewhat, if you want to buy them go ahead but I wouldn’t recommend them if you can get better
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 May 2023

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: 保育士実技試験に最適
review: 保育士試験用に購入値段が安いのと、消しゴムで消せるということで選びました。書き味ですが、基本文具は国内メーカーが優秀と言われ、特に鉛筆消しゴム類においては海外から日本の文具を求める設計士や芸術家も少なくありません。ですから、買わずとも子どもの学校用１２色鉛筆でも良かったのですが、保育士試験で多くは２４色が使われるとのことで、レビューでも評判の良かったこの商品を選択。書き味は、遜色ありません。消しゴムでも消せますが、鉛筆ほどしっかり消えるわけでもありません。クーピーペンシルを消すのと同じ感覚で良いと思います。箱がペーパーですので、中身がクシャっと偏るのが難点です。保育士試験で、別の筆箱に入れ替えることも考えましたが、布ポーチのような筆箱に入れていくと試験官が２４色チェックしにくいので、印象が悪いと学校で指導されました。このまま持参します。他のメーカーの金属性のケースに使う色だけ１２本に絞ってもっていかれる方もいるそうです。ケースでマイナス☆ひとつ＊輪郭や細かい部分は芯の固いこの商品を、背景や塗りつぶしには、芯の柔らかいカリスマカラーを二種類を２４色取り混ぜて試験に挑みました。

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: 孫にプレゼントしました！
review: 「クリスマスプレゼント」として、孫２人に渡す為に購入しました。消せるので、とても喜んで使いました！

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Ne s’effacent pas totalement
review: J’ai achète ceux-là et les crayola en même temps, ne sachant lesquels choisir, et ma préférence va aux crayola qui se gomment mieux. Avec ceux-là, il reste toujours une trace...

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Colori molto chiari
review: Buono il fatto che si possono cancellare, e il colore viene via completamente, ma le tonalità sono molto chiare.Utile lo strato di gomma che riveste e protegge la mina dalla rottura.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Solo para esbozar
review: Si necesitas un lápiz parecido los Prismacolor col-erase son muy válidos siempre y cuando solo sea para esbozar flojito. Si aprietas el trazo ya no se borran.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Erasable but not bold colour.
review: Great pencils that do erase quite well but the colour seems muted and you can't get a nice, deep, solid colour. I imagine it's because of the way they're erasable so you can't have both.Still good for adult colouring books though.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 November 2016

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Ihr Geld wert!
review: Die besten Buntstifte für Schulkinder...und ich habe schon viele ausprobiert!! Sie halten länger, brechen nicht so schnell ab und lassen sich sogar radieren. Der höhere Anschaffungspreis lohnt sich auf jeden Fall!

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Bellissimi colori
review: Prese per il mio bimbo di 8 anni.Colori bellissimi. Tratto un pò duro per poter essere facilmente sfumato dalle mani inesperte dei bambini, ma questo non toglie nulla alla qualità del prodotto.La gommina al fondo è pratica è permette di correggere velocemente eventuali sbavature.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Che bello colorare
review: Ottimi pastelli. Lo strato di ABS tra la mina e il legno evita che la mina si spezzi in caso di caduta. In più hanno la gomma per cancellare!

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Pencils
review: Who knew you could get these, a game changer for designing cross stitch patterns
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 December 2023

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Packungen offen, Stift ohne Mine
review: Ich habe zwei Packungen radierbare Buntstifte bestellt zum Verschenken. Leider kamen beide Packungen bereits geöffnet an. Sie waren jedoch vollständig. In einer Packung hatte der weiße Buntstifte aber keine Mine, er war einfach innem hohl. Sehr schade. Ansonsten malen sie ganz gut, man muss nicht zu doll aufdrücken und sie sind tatsächlich gut radierbar. Daher behalten wir sie und nutzen sie selbst.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: ケースが…
review: 中学生の息子が使う為に購入しました。 息子は気に入って使用しています。 紙のケースは、持ち運ぶ度に中身がグチャグチャになりました。 ペンケースとえんぴつキャップを買い使用しています。

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Keine anderen mehr
review: Diese Stifte kaufe ich seit Jahren für meinen Sohn für die Schule. Sicher kann man nicht alles wieder restlos wegradieren, aber dafür ist es auch nicht gedacht. Mein Sohn muß oft bestimmte Wörter unterstreichen oder Linien einmalen. Mit anderen Buntstiften hat er Pech gehabt wenn er sich vertan hat, dann sah sein Heft immer schlimm aus, durch das ganze durchstreichen. Hier aber kann man wenigstens den groben Strich wieder wegradieren und dann mit einem anderen darüber malen. Dafür ist es perfekt, und er hat wenigstens die Möglichkeit Fehler wieder zu korrigieren. Schon alleine dafür lohnen sie sich. Ich bin sehr zufrieden, und mein Sohn auch. Zudem hat er nun immer Radiergummis im Mäppchen, sollte er seins nicht finden, benutzt er einfach diese an den Stiften.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: 普通の色鉛筆です
review: 消せる色鉛筆が欲しくて、Amazonで探していたところこの商品に辿り着きました。まぁ、店頭で買うより安いので購入しましたが、普通の色鉛筆です。間違った箇所も消せます。

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: No se borran bien
review: Hemos decidido cambiar de marca porque estos no se borran bien pese a anunciar que son borrables. La punta se rompe con facilidad al sacarles punta es como si el color estuviese defectuoso. Nos decidimos porque es una marca conocida y tenían buen precio pero al final ha sido un dinero tirado a la basura. No recomiendo su compra.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Le matite per i primi anni di scuola
review: Finalmente le matite colorate cancellabili. Le ho acquistate per la mia bambina di prima elementare sempre alle prese con disegni e qualche errore da correggere. Ottime e resistenti

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: CRAYONS DE COULEUR AVEC LA GOMME INTÉGRÉE
review: Bonjour Meilleurs Voeux pour l'année 2019 Mon fils se sent beaucoup de crayons de couleur Avec la gomme intégrée c'est génial et super pratique .

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Erases Great
review: I used these pencils to trace sewing patterns onto vellum paper.  They show up well and erase cleanly.  What I don't like about them is that the lead is very soft and wears down quite fast necessitating constant sharpening.  Thus, they won't last long with constant use because of this.  It's too bad, because these types of pencils are hard to find.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2021

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Brilliant Colours and Quick Delivery!
review: These are a really good set of colouring pencils and the fact that you can rub them out is great!  A pack of 24 means that pretty much every colour you will need is covered and because it is Staedtler, you know that it is great quality!  Really pleased with my purchase and will definitely buy again.  Recommend to everyone!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 September 2010

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Schöne radierbare Buntstifte für Klein und Groß
review: Schöne Buntstifte die sich sogar radieren lassen.Der ideale Malspass für Klein und Groß.Diese Stifte werden wir sicher nochmal bestellen.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: 色が薄すぎます
review: 本の重要箇所に線を引くために購入しました線を引いてみると色が薄すぎて視認性が悪いです本当に色が薄い消えない色鉛筆で書いた線を消しゴムでこすって薄くなった線という感じ良い点は消しゴムで消せるという1点のみですね

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: die Besten die es gibt
review: sei dem wir ein Schulkind haben kaufen wir keine andren mehr. Bruchsicher, gut anzuspitzen, schöne kräftige Farben.das scheinen die anderen Kinder auch zu finden denn wir vermissen öfter mal einzelne Farben und müssen dann wieder aufstocken ;-)

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Consegna rapida, buon prodotto
review: La consegna è avvenuta rapidamente. La qualità delle matite sembra buona

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Que de couleurs !!! Et une gomme !
review: Des couleurs variées ! La gomme en bout de chaque crayon est un réel plus et la qualité du crayon est particulièrement satisfaisante ! On regrette peut être l'emballage carton qui s'habille et on aurait préféré une boîte métal ...

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: No se pueden borrar
review: Publicidad engañosa no son colores qué se puedan borrar y los compré sólo por esta característica

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Dure e non del tutto cancellabili
review: Articolo arrivato nei tempi previsti.Acquistato per mia figlia di 7 anni.Nella confezione ci sono 12 colori,  ognuno di loro è dotato di gommina nella parte terminale.Mia figlia adora i colori e ama colorare, ma trova questi colori duri e non li preferisce.Non sono del tutto cancellabili come si sperava, rimane sempre un leggero alone.Per il resto sono facili da temperare e la mina non si rompe facilmente.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: 普通の色鉛筆ですね
review: このメーカーのシャープペンが良かったので色鉛筆も買って下絵に使用しています。消える色鉛筆ということで色の編集はしやすいです。しかし、色鉛筆ということで色が淡いため強い筆圧で使用するのですが、そのためか、濃い黒鉛筆と同じで、消しゴムで消しても若干の色が消えずに残ってしまいます。鉛筆の一本一本すべてのバックに消しゴムがついていて、すべてが六角の色鉛筆であり、色鉛筆自体には高級感があります。ですが、個別に色の名前が記入されてないのは残念でした。。。紙ケースから出して混ざったら色の種類が分からなくなってしまうので気をつけてください。写真で見て期待したよりも色のバリエーションは多く感じ、色鉛筆自体も一本19cmと結構長いので、使いやすく良い商品だと思います。

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Get what you pay for.. they sort of erase
review: The pencil colors are not very saturated and they only sort of erase.

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Not what I expected
review: They are ‘okay’ but if you an artist looking for erasable coloured pencils buy the col-erase they are worth the money..in my opinion these aren’t

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Perfekt für skizzen
review: Super schöne Stifte ❤️

prod_name: STAEDTLER 144 50NC24 Noris Club Erasable Colouring Pencils - Assorted Colours, Pack of 24
title: Top dei colori
review: Ho acquistato questi colori per mio figlio che frequenta la prima elementare e sono molto soddisfatta del rapporto qualità -prezzo.  I colori si presentano ognuno provvisto di gomma da cancellare,  molto utili per chi ci tiene a un risultato preciso.  Spedizione e imballo perfetti.

prod_name: Faber-Castell Grip 1345 0.5mm Mechanical Pencil - Green
title: Empaquetado deficiente.
review: Muy buen producto pero el empaquetado fue demasiado simple, no era lo que esperaba, llegó en una bola de plástico transparente y con una bolsa de envío de Amazon.

prod_name: Faber-Castell Grip 1345 0.5mm Mechanical Pencil - Green
title: 滑らかです。
review: 滑らかな書き味です。友人のプレゼント用に購入しました。とても喜んでもらえました。

prod_name: Faber-Castell Grip 1345 0.5mm Mechanical Pencil - Green
title: beau porte-mine
review: Très joli, bleu foncé brillant, fait bonne impression. On dirait un stylo, il ne ressemble pas du tout à un porte mine bon marché. A l'usage, je l'apprécie beaucoup, il tient bien dans la main, la mine ne se casse pas toutes les trois secondes, il écrit bien, fluidement, sans avoir besoin d'appuyer, la gomme rétractable sort au fur et  à mesure des besoins, et gomme correctement (sans plus, mais c'est une mini-gomme aussi). Je trouve la gomme rétractable un plus, elle reste toujours propre comme ça, bien que le porte mine traîne sur le bureau ou au fond du sac... Bref bon achat, je recommande autant le vendeur que le produit.

prod_name: Faber-Castell Grip 1345 0.5mm Mechanical Pencil - Green
title: Pas le meme couleur
review: J'ai commandé un criterium bleu et je le reçoit noir.Décevant mais très bon tout de même.

prod_name: Faber-Castell Grip 1345 0.5mm Mechanical Pencil - Green
title: Muy cómodo
review: Me gusta mucho y es muy cómodo escribir con él.

prod_name: Faber-Castell Grip 1345 0.5mm Mechanical Pencil - Green
title: Fonctionnel

review: 届いたのは写真の三角グリップではなく普通の丸グリップでした。子供の為なので三角を期待したのですが。その点を除けば優れた物です。芯が引っ込むのはかなり筆圧をかけてからなので書き味がフニャフニャと言うことはありません。外観はステッドラーやロットリングなどとは較べられません。美しく工夫してありますが、価格を反映した部分があります。

prod_name: Helix Oxford Hb Grade Graphite Pencils (Pack of 12) with Plastic Free Packaging Drawing
title: Gute Bleistifte
review: Die Verarbeitung der Bleistifte ist gut. Sauber lackiert und angespitzt.Die Bleistifte schreiben gut (weiches Schreibgefühl trotz HB-Härte) und lassen sich gut spitzen, ohne dass die Mine abbricht. Der Radiergummi ist in Ordnung. Im Vergleich zu seinem Stand-alone-Bruder zeigt dieser kleine Killer leider Schwächen. Er radiert zwar gut, ist aber bei weitem nicht so effektiv, sodass das geschriebene Wort am Ende noch deutlicher zu sehen ist. Auch der Verbrauch an Radiermasse ist höher, um ein vergleichbares Ergebnis zum normalen Radiergummi zu erhalten. Ein Bild vom Radierergebnis könnt ihr euch beim angehängten Foto machen.Qualität Schreiben: 5 Sterne.Qualität Radieren: 3-4 SternePreis-Leistungs-Verhältnis: 5 Sterne.

prod_name: Helix Oxford Hb Grade Graphite Pencils (Pack of 12) with Plastic Free Packaging Drawing
title: Pencils
review: Hard to find 2B pencils. These are predictable in quality, which is good. Maybe the eraser is just wee bit too soft, or maybe I just press a little too hard when using it. I have ordered these before, and used them, and will order more when this supply has been exhausted.  Update: I have recently had to buy other makes of 2B pencil and I can state that none have been anywhere near as good as these by Oxford.  Even more expensive pencils are nowhere near as a good.  I have been given, as presents, some very highly regarded and very expensive types of pencils which have allegedly been used by high profile and famous writers and authors and these Oxford pencils beat them all, in my opinion.  For quality and price, they can’t be beaten.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 February 2023

prod_name: Helix Oxford Hb Grade Graphite Pencils (Pack of 12) with Plastic Free Packaging Drawing
title: Good value if you need lots of 2b.
review: The package was half open at one end, both untaped. A yellow sticker (why?) had been placed over description of where my tucked away house is, and as usual my small “b” was changed to the look-a-likey 2B …items delivered to 28 in past, food eaten, no one opens the door!  A sign on the door instructs to place parcel on the porch chair please. Thrown on the doormat. Not hygienic or good for the elderly having to bend down. I knew a delivery driver who could not read English well. Again “WHY” - “aren’t they TAUGHT COMMON INSTRUCTIONS?” We would be if we worked abroad, it is the rule in many places. Anyway The HELIX pencils make a great present! Even if to yourself as this was.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 November 2022

title: Ready sharpened, quality HB pencils with erasers at the end
review: I bought these to use in a workshop that I run. I needed good quality HB pencils with erasers and these are really good quality. They come ready sharpened and neatly presented in a storage box. There are two options to choose from and I have the ones with the erasers at the end of the pencils. I researched for quite some time before deciding on these and they are by far the best option I could find. I am thrilled with them and after testing one of the pencils out, I can say they are just what I wanted and good value for money.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 January 2017

prod_name: Helix Oxford Hb Grade Graphite Pencils (Pack of 12) with Plastic Free Packaging Drawing
title: Great pencils
review: I heard quite good words about these pencils and I remember that I used them when I was a child. Lovely, sturdy and thick pencils. My child is using them to do his homeworks and it's perfect for him! Excellent value of money! I recommend it with trust.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 March 2021

prod_name: Helix Oxford Hb Grade Graphite Pencils (Pack of 12) with Plastic Free Packaging Drawing
title: Could be more dark
review: My son’s teacher suggested to buy this as my son’s handwriting is barely legible with normal HB pencil.So it is bit disappointing that the pencils don’t write as dark as expected. It writes more like normal HB pencils.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 July 2021

prod_name: Helix Oxford Hb Grade Graphite Pencils (Pack of 12) with Plastic Free Packaging Drawing
title: A pencil  which is easily handled
review: I love these pencils and erasers as they are of such high quality. They sharpen easily but don't break easily. Excellent service from vendor
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 August 2020

prod_name: Helix Oxford Hb Grade Graphite Pencils (Pack of 12) with Plastic Free Packaging Drawing
title: You can write with these.
review: They're pencils. I used one end for writing, and it wrote. I used the other end to remove the writing, and it removed the writing. I've only used one of the pencils as of writing this review, but it's worked flawlessly with no issues.All pencils arrived sharp and intact. I stabbed my finger when I stuck one in my pocket, so I can say with surety that they're sharp.The label was slightly different from pictured, but that's just a superficial change.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 February 2016

prod_name: Helix Oxford Hb Grade Graphite Pencils (Pack of 12) with Plastic Free Packaging Drawing
title: 4/5 Great but Rubber Quality is Upsetting.
review: 4/5Great Pencils.Received them roughly 7 Hours ago, and none have broken so far. What's bad about them is the Rubber on top of the Pencils. They aren't very effective so I wouldn't recommend using them otherwise it would make you're drawing a disaster.Apart from that they are great for Writing, Drawing but not for Erasing.- Jake
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 February 2016

title: My favourite pencils
review: I use mechanical pencils for work as a music teacher as they are very fine for writing under notes on sheet music. I’ve gone through quite a few over the years and this brand are the best quality - they write nice and dark too. I find the nibs don’t break under pressure as easily like other brands. Recommended.

title: Contento con el producto
review: Son portaminas de 0,7mm. La descripción del producto es errónea. Son minas muy resistentes y se escribe muy suave. Son los portaminas de la antigua marca Conté con su mismo diseño pero renombrados cómo Bic, ya que la compró cómo se indica en la descripción. Es el portaminas que utilicé de pequeño en la EGB. No lo había visto desde entonces en ninguna papelería. Me hizo ilusión verlo en Amazon y encima a un precio muy bueno.

title: Angemessene Qualität für den Preis
review: 6€ für 12 Stifte mit 36 Minen sind superbillig. Ich plane, neue Minen dazuzukaufen, bis das Plastik seinen Geist aufgibt, was ökologisch OK sein dürfte. Leider brechen bei Benutzung immer mal wieder 3mm der Mine ab, daher keine 5 Sterne.Außerdem kann ich berichten, dass die Stifte (mutmaßlich) eine Buntwäsche, jedoch deinitiv keinen Trocknergang überstehen.

prod_name: Bic Matic Original Mechanical Pencils, Perfect for School and Office Use, 0.7 mm Black (HB), Includes 3 HB Lead Refills and Eraser, 12 Count (Pack of 1)
title: Fiable et pas cher
review: Ces portes mines sont fiables en pas cher. En général, une fois qu'ils sont vides, je les recharge avec d'autres mines, et ils durent plusieurs années (quand j’achète d'autres marques, le caoutchouc qui retient la mine s'use, et la mine remonte durant l'utilisation).Néanmoins, la qualité des mines est variables. Certaines mines fournis avec les criteriums sont creuses, et se cassent très facilement. C'est agaçant et la qualité d'écriture est médiocre. Je recommande d'acheter des bonnes mines pour remplacer celles d'origines.Je conseil ces porte-mines pour le travail ou l'école, car ils sont bon marché. Si on le perd, on est pas triste !

title: Salviamo qualche albero 🎄
review: Queste matite hanno la mina di grafite ma al posto del solito legno che avvolge la mina, c'è una resina sintetica.Le hanno provate i miei figli che sono alle medie e alle elementari.Mi dicono che secondo loro sono più o meno simili alle classiche matite, il valore aggiunto sta nell'ergonomia. Il materiale più morbido rispetto al legno consente un'impugnatura migliore.L'immagine trae in inganno, pensavo fossero flessibili, non lo sono.😊PRO- Non hanno legno, coscienza ecologica salva!- impugnatura comoda- classica mina di grafite, si cancella con solita gomma per matita- si tempera con normale temperino da matite classiche😬CONTRO- pensavo che la protezione dagli urti data da questo nuovo materiale indicata sulla scatola, proteggesse la mina dalle rotture, si riferisce invece al materiale stesso.Sono praticamente matite normali per le quali non hanno usato legno.Vi consiglio l'acquisto 🎄Spero che la recensione ti sia stata utile 😊

prod_name: BIC Evolution Graphite Pencils - Pack of 8 - HB Pencils with Eraser - Colourful Stripe Design and Shock-Resistant Lead

review: These look very nice and feel very nice. Everything is good until you start using it. The lead is not good quality. You have to press hard to make a decent mark and even then it's very light. Shame.

title: Vano bene ma NON sono adatte a bambini piccoli.
review: Ho comprato queste matite per i miei bambini di 6 e 8 anni, purtroppo la punta si spezza facilmente con la pressione che fanno quando scrivono, così devono rifare la punta spesso e la matita non dura più di due giorni... ma non si rompe solo la punta! l’intera matita si spezza in due con la solo forza delle loro manine,  quindi non sono adatte a bambini piccoli, ma vanno bene in ufficio o per i bambini più grandi.

title: Belle matite

Solo dopo averle ricevute e temperate per la prima volta mi sono accorta che non sono di legno ma di un materiale che somiglia alla plastica e dovrebbero essere più resistenti

prod_name: BIC Evolution Graphite Pencils - Pack of 8 - HB Pencils with Eraser - Colourful Stripe Design and Shock-Resistant Lead
title: Ottimi
review: Impugnatura comoda, punta resistente e giusta per le prime scritture, la scrittura risulta scorrevole e il design molto carino. Mia figlia che scrive solo con il lapis, essendo in prima elementare, si trova molto bene.

prod_name: BIC Evolution Graphite Pencils - Pack of 8 - HB Pencils with Eraser - Colourful Stripe Design and Shock-Resistant Lead
title: Matite per bambini distratti
review: Ho acquistato queste matite in quanto mio figlio che frequenta la seconda elementare fa sempre cadere tutto a terra. La mia missione era cercare delle matite con una mina resistente. Una cosa per me importante è anche la cancellabilità della matita perchè il mio bimbo pasticcione tende a bucare i fogli se la matita non si cancella bene. Devo dire che queste matite hanno soddisfatto le mie richieste!

prod_name: BIC Evolution Graphite Pencils - Pack of 8 - HB Pencils with Eraser - Colourful Stripe Design and Shock-Resistant Lead
title: Ottime ma mina un po' dura
review: Queste matite mantengono ciò che promettono, sono effettivamente più resistenti di quelle normali. l'unica differenza sta nel fatto che hanno la mina più dura delle normali hb, quindi il tratto risulta più leggero a fronte di una pressione normale.

prod_name: BIC Evolution Graphite Pencils - Pack of 8 - HB Pencils with Eraser - Colourful Stripe Design and Shock-Resistant Lead
title: Matite
review: Esteticamente carine,comode nell'impugnatura,mina resistente e durature. Consigliate!!!

title: Je recommande

D'altronde il brand è sinonimo di qualità e ha dimostrato di saperci fare, non solo con le penne!

In definitiva, consiglio l'acquisto.

prod_name: BIC Matic Fun, HB Mechanical Pencils and Eraser, Assorted Barrel Colours with Fine ,Yellow,Blue,Green,White,Pink,Point (0.7mm), Pack of 5,Yellow,Blue,Green,White,Pink
title: Comodissime!
review: Da anni utilizzo queste matite automatiche, apprezzandone la versatilità e la leggerezza. La mina è sempre pronta (ogni matita ne contiene diverse e, una volta esaurite, è facilissimo aggiungerne altre). Il tratto, 0,7 mm, per me è ideale per prendere appunti. Il gommino, praticissimo, cancella facilmente il tratto. Sono arrivate in una scatolina di cartoncino aperta ma non mancava niente. L'assortimento dei colori è casuale, infatti i 4 colori sono forniti in numeri variabili. Ho approfittato dell'offerta Amazon per distribuirle fra i miei figli e nelle varie borse da lavoro. Prodotto molto buono.
